text:
@JohnCornyn @DailyCaller Spare us a lecture on class. @AmbassadorRice made a serious point about you & your colleagues feckless conduct in the face of #trump’s misconduct

You showed Corona Beer w/the #coronavirus tagline as a sick attempt at humor; downplaying a pandemic that’s killed 117,000 Americans

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
